title: TerminalLogger: Progress reporting
body:
> Perhaps this could interoperate with the Windows Terminal progress bar feature <https://github.com/microsoft/terminal/issues/3004>.

_Originally posted by @KalleOlaviNiemitalo in https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/6944#issuecomment-943003725_

nodes.body: We implemented the spinner a long time ago but I'd like to use this to track an overall-build-progress indicator (when we figure out a way to approximate one).
